column4: can someone help me with launcher commands.  I am trying to run play/pause buttons on a panel.  The help document told me the command would be "listen --play-pause"...but this does not work, and I get an error message?
prog name -pause eg.,. : amarok -pause
wot r u trying to do?
I have downloaded a gtk theme set...within that set were some media buttons to put on a panel that will control your player, in this case rhythmbox..I am trying to get these to work
are you trying to pause ur music from the terminal,. those commands work as default for any program with a play/pause button
so the buttons dont work?
no
sorry,.,. not sure how to make non-working buttons work
thats quite a handfull ur trying to do there,. i dunno what an XBMC is though
it's the xbox media center
so you want to send a microsft format to linix and vice versa?
if thats the description, then yes!
which art of that are you having problems with?
within xbox, I have set it to search for the linux smb shares....so when I am on linux I can stream fine
however, when I have booted into windows, the xbox can no longer see the linux shares and does not work
you mean booted into windows on the xbox?
on the PC
and linux on the xbox?
you need to have the linux files on the windows aswell
so just set up so windows can see the files on the linux hard drive?

your overcomplicating things,. just share both of the folders so you can see everything from linux and windows,. fix 1 problem at a time,.,. remove the xbox from the equation untill you have the sharing sorted
